video.title: Cristela
video.synopsis: A law student lands an esteemed but unpaid internship, to the dismay of her traditional family members, who'd prefer she get a paying job or husband.

episodes.synopsis: Cristela's decision to take an unpaid legal internship doesn't go over well with her sister Daniela and brother-in-law, Felix, whom she lives with.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: When Daniela signs Cristela up for an online dating site, her profile becomes popular, but her first blind date proves to be an unexpected surprise.
episodes.title: Soul Mates

episodes.synopsis: Sparks fly when Daniela's wealthy friend mistakenly believes Cristela is the nanny, a misunderstanding that Daniela does nothing to correct.
episodes.title: Mr. Felix & Ms. Daniela

episodes.synopsis: Cristela goes all out to make the office Halloween party a success. Meanwhile, Natalia's Day of the Dead celebration makes her an unexpected hit.
episodes.title: Hall-Oates-Ween

episodes.synopsis: After mistaking Mark Cuban for a maintenance man, Josh asks Cristela to help him understand sports to get a leg up in an upcoming review.
episodes.title: Super Fan

episodes.synopsis: Cristela works on a case involving equal pay for women, while at home, Daniela reveals that she's earned more than Felix for years and he doesn't know.
episodes.title: Equal Pay

episodes.synopsis: Cristela tries to persuade Felix to let her take Henry to see "West Side Story," while at work, she's used as a prop for office "diversity" photos.
episodes.title: Enter Singing

episodes.synopsis: When Trent's office floor needs replacing, Cristela suggests Felix and Alberto for the job but quickly comes to regret it.
episodes.title: Floor Favor

episodes.synopsis: Josh inadvertently crashes Cristela's family Christmas tradition, and Cristela's brother, Eddie, visits from out of state for the holidays.
episodes.title: It's Not About the Tamales

episodes.synopsis: Trent and his wife, Veronica, may be headed for a breakup, but it's Cristela who's caught in the middle when Veronica makes her a tempting job offer.
episodes.title: Veronica

episodes.synopsis: Cristela tries to find out which member of her family inspired Izzy's recent bullying streak. After all, it couldn't be Cristela herself,could it?
episodes.title: Dead Arm

episodes.synopsis: Daniela fears Cristela's job is taking its toll on her health, and a trip to the free clinic reveals some surprises. Meanwhile, Josh learns CPR.
episodes.title: Hypertension

episodes.synopsis: Cristela fills in as Trent's assistant, a job that finally pays. Meanwhile, Daniela and Cristina mistakenly fear that Natalia is dying.
episodes.title: Mexican Mona Lisa

episodes.synopsis: With Trent and Veronica about to break up, Cristela finds herself playing marriage counselor. Meanwhile, Daniela learns that Felix lied about an ex.
episodes.title: Marriage, Counselor

episodes.synopsis: Cristela's push for Izzy to join the school's gifted and talented program has some unexpected backlash. Meanwhile, Maddie lands in the mail room.
episodes.title: Gifted and Talented

episodes.synopsis: Cristela gets double-booked as Henry's confirmation sponsor and Trent's date at a fundraiser. At the latter, Trent makes a perceived racist comment.
episodes.title: Confirmation

episodes.synopsis: When her rival announces her granddaughter's quinceañera, Natalia sees the opportunity to show off her family, including Cristela's "boyfriend," Josh.
episodes.title: Fifteen-Something

episodes.synopsis: Cristela is conflicted when Trent asks her to sit at his table for a trial involving minority rights. Meanwhile, Daniela suspects Alberto's motives.
episodes.title: Latino 101

episodes.synopsis: Trent asks Cristela for help in improving Maddie's work ethic. Meanwhile, Felix must care for the kids by himself while Daniela is on a business trip.
episodes.title: Great Expectations

episodes.synopsis: Cristela tries to pave the way for a business expansion for client Mike Baxter (Tim Allen, crossing over from his series "Last Man Standing").
episodes.title: Last Goose Standing

episodes.synopsis: When Daniela loses her job, Natalia suddenly demands that Cristela postpone taking the bar exam so she can get a job and help the family.
episodes.title: Village Mode

episodes.synopsis: After passing the bar exam, Cristela takes a position with Trent's firm, hires Josh (who didn't pass) as her assistant and faces living on her own.
episodes.title: Movin' On Up
